results: Heat pumps with thermal storage outperform storage technologies
V2G and smart charging competitive with storage for some applications
LCODR provides a tool for assessing competitiveness of DR schemes
title: Levelised Cost of Demand Response Estimating the Cost-Competitiveness of Flexible Demand.pdf
abstract: Green, Robert Shorten • The LCODR permits the comparison of storage and demand response solutions • Four DR schemes: V2G, smart charging, smart heat pump, heat pump + thermal storage • Heat pumps with thermal storage are cheaper than any other DR or storage technology • V2G and smart charging are competitive with storage for some applications arXiv:2502.03124v1 [eess.SY] 5 Feb 2025
